My100DaysOfCode - Milestones

by Ameya Sinha on November 8, 2018 under 100DaysOfCode
1 minute read

This winter vacations I plan to take the 100DaysOfCode Challenge. You can follow my progress on Github or on Twitter.

Here is my milstones page :)

Things I did before the challenge

  • Took the following classes at my university
         1. Data Structures and Algorithms
         2. Object Oriented Programming
         3. Database Management Systems
         4. Operating Systems
         5. Data Mining

  • Solved Competitive Coding questions on
         1. Codechef
         2. Hackerrank
         3. Spoj
         4. Codeforces

  • Completed these MOOCS
         1. Algorithmic Toolbox

Things I knew before the challenge

  • Languages
         1. C (Beginner)
         2. Java (Beginner)
         3. C++ (Intermediate)
         4. Python (Beginner)
